Bicycle-powered charging station: Construct a bicycle-powered charging station where people can charge their electronic devices by pedaling the bicycle.
Bicycle-powered water pump: Connect a water pump to the bicycle's rear wheel and use the pedaling motion to pump water from a well or river into a storage tank.
Bicycle-powered food processor: Attach a food processor to the back of the bicycle and use the pedaling motion to power the blades, allowing for sustainable food processing in remote areas.
Bicycle-powered desalination plant: Use the bicycle's pedaling motion to drive a desalination plant, providing clean drinking water from saltwater sources.
Bicycle-powered greenhouse: Use the bicycle's wheels to generate electricity, which can be used to power a greenhouse's heating and lighting systems.
